titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Oversize Ms. Codex 561: Risposta all' historia della sacra inquisitione composta già dal R.P. Paolo Servita.

availability.licence: These images and the content of Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts Oversize Ms. Codex 561: Risposta all' historia della sacra inquisitione composta già dal R.P. msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: Albizzi's response to Paolo Sarpi's history of the Inquisition was published anonymously, this copy lacks the index found in the second edition, and therefore may be a copy of the first edition.

msItem.title: Risposta all' historia della sacra inquisitione composta già dal R.P. Paolo Servita.

supportDesc.extent: 370 leaves : 273 x 204 (230 x 105) mm bound to 280 x 215 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Paper, 370; [x], 1-202, 204-408, 408-549, 560-589, 591-657, [xliv]; contemporary pagination in ink, [x, 1-730]; modern pagination in pencil, upper outer corners.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in a cursive script by a single hand, with notes in a second hand (p. 725-726).

binding.p: Green-stained contemporary parchment. Moderate oxidation of ink throughout.

history.provenance: Former owners include: Cardinal Giuseppe Renato Imperiali, 1651-1737 (signature, p. i; stamp, p. 1); Frederick North, Earl of Guilford (bookplate, inside upper cover); Sir Thomas Phillipps, no. 5318 (note, inside upper cover).
